lead_paragraph: While the news media was focused on another set of nuptials, we nearly forgot to congratulate Lisa Simpson on her impending marriage to Hugh Parkfield, as predicted in a 1995 episode of "The Simpsons":
snippet: As predicted by a 1995 episode of "The Simpsons," before the family realized they'd be sharing the weekend with Chelsea Clinton.

headline.main: D'oh! We Almost Spaced on Lisa Simpson's Wedding Date!

abstract: As predicted by a 1995 episode of "The Simpsons," before the family realized they'd be sharing the weekend with Chelsea Clinton.
